column1: CMOR Table 6hrPlev: Fields (Sampled Every 6 Hours) for Storm-Track Analysis and other Advanced Diagnostic Applications
The 6-hourly data on pressure levels should be sampled as "snapshots" (not as 6-hour means) at 0Z, 6Z, 12Z, and 18Z and should be collected only for the following experiments and years.

column5: 30 years -- preferably corresponding to years 1979-2008 of the historical run

column4: on the following pressure levels: 850, 500, 250 hPa
